meanings.definition: A plant believed to have medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The feverroot grew tall in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist used feverroot to make a healing potion.
meanings.sent3: The feverroot winked at the other plants, knowing its powers.
meanings.sent4: In the field of herbs, feverroot stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of feverroot filled the room, promising wellness.

meanings.definition: The root of a plant used to treat fevers.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea with feverroot to bring down the fever.
meanings.sent2: The medicine man always carried feverroot in his pouch.
meanings.sent3: The feverroot danced in the pot, ready to cool the fever.
meanings.sent4: His words were like feverroot, soothing her worries.
meanings.sent5: The touch of feverroot on her forehead brought relief.
